props.border: Applies border styles to the child [v-avatar](/components/avatars) components.
props.gap: Sets the overlap gap between avatars. Negative values cause avatars to overlap.
props.hoverable: Enables a hover animation on child avatars.
props.limit: Limits the number of visible avatars. Remaining items are represented by an overflow indicator.
props.overflowText: Custom text to display in the overflow avatar. Defaults to `+N` where N is the number of hidden items.
props.reverse: Reverses the stacking order of the avatars.
props.size: Sets the size of all child avatars.
props.vertical: Stacks avatars vertically instead of horizontally.

slots.prepend: Custom content to be displayed before the avatar list.
slots.append: Custom content to be displayed after the avatar list.
slots.item: Customize each avatar item. Receives `props` and `index`.
slots.overflow: Customize the overflow indicator. Receives the count of hidden items.
